attributes.action: Sack any minister who announces any stupid and unworkable policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cabinet are always coming out with these stupid ideas, which everyone knows are obviously unworkable, yet they remain in office.  I say if they are that stupid we should sack them and not allow them back into office.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
